mapper.select: SELECT st.s_name,c.c_name,c.c_phone,ca.`chepai`,b.b_name,s.vs_name,cl.bc_name,ca.daoqiyers,ca.nextbytime,ca.nextbylichen FROM carmanagement ca LEFT JOIN customer c ON c.`c_id`= ca.`c_id` LEFT JOIN brand b ON b.b_id = ca.`b_id` LEFT JOIN series s ON s.vs_id = ca.`vs_id` LEFT JOIN store st ON st.s_id = ca.s_id LEFT JOIN color cl ON cl.bc_id = ca.`bc_id` ORDER BY ca.`cjdate` DESC

select carmagid, b_id, vs_id, v_id, i_id, bc_id, m_id, s_id, c_id, chepai, chejiano, fadongjino, zuoweinumber, buydate, daoqiyers, newlichen, nextbytime, nextbylichen, yesorno, beizhu, jianyi from asms.carmanagement where carmagid = #{carmagid}

select carmagid, b_id, vs_id, v_id, i_id, bc_id, m_id, s_id, c_id, chepai, chejiano, fadongjino, zuoweinumber, buydate, daoqiyers, newlichen, nextbytime, nextbylichen, yesorno, beizhu, jianyi from asms.carmanagement limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into asms.carmanagement(b_id, vs_id, v_id, i_id, bc_id, s_id, c_id, chepai, chejiano, fadongjino, zuoweinumber, buydate, daoqiyers, newlichen, nextbytime, nextbylichen, yesorno, beizhu, jianyi) values (#{bId}, #{vsId}, #{vId}, #{iId}, #{bcId}, #{sId}, #{cId}, #{chepai}, #{chejiano}, #{fadongjino}, #{zuoweinumber}, #{buydate}, #{daoqiyers}, #{newlichen}, #{nextbytime}, #{nextbylichen}, #{yesorno}, #{beizhu}, #{jianyi})

insert into asms.carmanagement(b_id, vs_id, v_id, i_id, bc_id, m_id, s_id, c_id, chepai, chejiano, fadongjino, zuoweinumber, buydate, daoqiyers, newlichen, nextbytime, nextbylichen, yesorno, beizhu, jianyi) values
(#{entity.bId}, #{entity.vsId}, #{entity.vId}, #{entity.iId}, #{entity.bcId}, #{entity.mId}, #{entity.sId}, #{entity.cId}, #{entity.chepai}, #{entity.chejiano}, #{entity.fadongjino}, #{entity.zuoweinumber}, #{entity.buydate}, #{entity.daoqiyers}, #{entity.newlichen}, #{entity.nextbytime}, #{entity.nextbylichen}, #{entity.yesorno}, #{entity.beizhu}, #{entity.jianyi})

insert into asms.carmanagement(b_id, vs_id, v_id, i_id, bc_id, m_id, s_id, c_id, chepai, chejiano, fadongjino, zuoweinumber, buydate, daoqiyers, newlichen, nextbytime, nextbylichen, yesorno, beizhu, jianyi) values
(#{entity.bId}, #{entity.vsId}, #{entity.vId}, #{entity.iId}, #{entity.bcId}, #{entity.mId}, #{entity.sId}, #{entity.cId}, #{entity.chepai}, #{entity.chejiano}, #{entity.fadongjino}, #{entity.zuoweinumber}, #{entity.buydate}, #{entity.daoqiyers}, #{entity.newlichen}, #{entity.nextbytime}, #{entity.nextbylichen}, #{entity.yesorno}, #{entity.beizhu}, #{entity.jianyi})
on duplicate key update b_id = values(b_id) , vs_id = values(vs_id) , v_id = values(v_id) , i_id = values(i_id) , bc_id = values(bc_id) , m_id = values(m_id) , s_id = values(s_id) , c_id = values(c_id) , chepai = values(chepai) , chejiano = values(chejiano) , fadongjino = values(fadongjino) , zuoweinumber = values(zuoweinumber) , buydate = values(buydate) , daoqiyers = values(daoqiyers) , newlichen = values(newlichen) , nextbytime = values(nextbytime) , nextbylichen = values(nextbylichen) , yesorno = values(yesorno) , beizhu = values(beizhu) , jianyi = values(jianyi)
mapper.update:
update asms.carmanagement
b_id = #{bId},
vs_id = #{vsId},
v_id = #{vId},
i_id = #{iId},
bc_id = #{bcId},
m_id = #{mId},
s_id = #{sId},
c_id = #{cId},
chepai = #{chepai},
chejiano = #{chejiano},
fadongjino = #{fadongjino},
zuoweinumber = #{zuoweinumber},
buydate = #{buydate},
daoqiyers = #{daoqiyers},
newlichen = #{newlichen},
nextbytime = #{nextbytime},
nextbylichen = #{nextbylichen},
yesorno = #{yesorno},
beizhu = #{beizhu},
jianyi = #{jianyi},
where carmagid = #{carmagid}
